snippet.title: Otokiyome | GamePlay PC
snippet.description:
Story
You live in a village deep in the mountains, and a personal computer is delivered to you.
The display on it shows "Shirakawa Yuri," a being who claims to be the end of the Gods.
You are to cooperate with Shirakawa Yuri's sound purification
As you escape from the monster, and as you purify the sound, you will gradually remember the truth.

What you will see when you purify the sound and get rid of the stain...

"Otokiyome" is a bizarre horror adventure based on the original idea of VTuber "Shirakawa Yuri".

Overview
"Otokiyome" is a first-person 3D horror adventure game featuring real-life Vtubers.
The voice actors are provided by Tamiyasu Tomoe and other people who are mainly active in the virtual world, and you will be able to enjoy the sound throughout the game.

You, the main character, together with the support character "Shirakawa Yuri," collect necessary items from your house or village, go to the place where the sound is polluted, put down your PC, and purify the pollution together with Shirakawa Yuri.

Then a monster will appear and attack the computer to destroy it.

You must run away from the monster while protecting your computer.
While the monster is far away, place the computer again in the place where the sound is polluted repeatedly until the purification gauge is full, the uncleanness will be exorcised and the sound will be purified.

There are a total of five locations for sound purification.
As you purify the sound, exorcise the uncleanness, and eliminate the apparition, you will remember the truth.

How to play
Move - WASD
Action - Left click
Run - Shift
Select Item - Wheel
Use Item - Right click
Option - ESC
Skip Talk - Space
Capture - P
.
About Live Streaming
We welcome live streaming and play-by-play of this work. We welcome live streaming and play-by-play of this game on any monetized platform. We hope you can enjoy this game with many people.
